Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier interlocking problems at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier interlocking problems at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with delays at Howard due to interlocking problems

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with delays at Howard due to interlocking problems.

Shuttle buses are available from Howard to Thorndale to provide additional connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to interlocking problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to interlocking problems

Shuttle buses have been requested  from Howard to Linden to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
